message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.CR 

The paper deals with anomaly detection and localization in crowded scenes using computer vision techniques. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a statistical learning algorithm, which falls under the category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The use of shape contexts and optical flows for short-term trajectory description suggests the possibility of the paper belonging to cs.LG (Machine Learning). The use of real-world surveillance videos suggests the possibility of the paper belonging to cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper deals with security and surveillance, which suggests the possibility of the paper belonging to cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
